004
005package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
006
007/** NetworkTables publish/subscribe option. */
008public class PubSubOption {
009  private static final int kPeriodic = 1;
010  private static final int kSendAll = 2;
011  private static final int kTopicsOnly = 3;
012  private static final int kPollStorage = 4;
013  private static final int kKeepDuplicates = 5;
014  private static final int kLocalRemote = 6;
015
016  PubSubOption(int type, double value) {
017    m_type = type;
018    m_value = value;
019  }
020
021  /**
022   * How frequently changes will be sent over the network. NetworkTables may send more frequently
023   * than this (e.g. use a combined minimum period for all values) or apply a restricted range to
024   * this value. The default if unspecified (and the immediate flag is false) is 100 ms. This option
025   * and the immediate option override each other.
026   *
027   * @param period time between updates, in seconds
028   * @return option
029   */
030  public static PubSubOption periodic(double period) {
031    return new PubSubOption(kPeriodic, period);
032  }
033
034  /**
035   * If enabled, sends all value changes over the network even if only sent periodically. This
036   * option defaults to disabled.
037   *
038   * @param enabled True to enable, false to disable
039   * @return option
040   */
041  public static PubSubOption sendAll(boolean enabled) {
042    return new PubSubOption(kSendAll, enabled ? 1.0 : 0.0);
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * If enabled, no value changes are sent over the network. This option defaults to disabled.
047   *
048   * @param enabled True to enable, false to disable
049   * @return option
050   */
051  public static PubSubOption topicsOnly(boolean enabled) {
052    return new PubSubOption(kTopicsOnly, enabled ? 1.0 : 0.0);
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * If enabled, preserves duplicate value changes (rather than ignoring them). This option defaults
057   * to disabled.
058   *
059   * @param enabled True to enable, false to disable
060   * @return option
061   */
062  public static PubSubOption keepDuplicates(boolean enabled) {
063    return new PubSubOption(kKeepDuplicates, enabled ? 1.0 : 0.0);
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Polling storage for subscription. Specifies the maximum number of updates NetworkTables should
068   * store between calls to the subscriber's readQueue() function. Defaults to 1 if sendAll is
069   * false, 20 if sendAll is true.
070   *
071   * @param depth number of entries to save for polling.
072   * @return option
073   */
074  public static PubSubOption pollStorage(int depth) {
075    return new PubSubOption(kPollStorage, depth);
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * If only local value updates should be queued for readQueue(). See also remoteOnly() and
080   * allUpdates(). Default is allUpdates. Only has an effect on subscriptions.
081   *
082   * @return option
083   */
084  public static PubSubOption localOnly() {
085    return new PubSubOption(kLocalRemote, 1.0);
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * If only remote value updates should be queued for readQueue(). See also localOnly() and
090   * allUpdates(). Default is allUpdates. Only has an effect on subscriptions.
091   *
092   * @return option
093   */
094  public static PubSubOption remoteOnly() {
095    return new PubSubOption(kLocalRemote, 2.0);
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * If both local and remote value updates should be queued for readQueue(). See also localOnly()
100   * and remoteOnly(). Default is allUpdates. Only has an effect on subscriptions.
101   *
102   * @return option
103   */
104  public static PubSubOption allUpdates() {
105    return new PubSubOption(kLocalRemote, 0.0);
106  }
107
108  final int m_type;
109  final double m_value;
110}
